questions.question: যদি f ( x ) = x 1 + x f(\mathrm{x})=\frac{\mathrm{x}}{1+\mathrm{x}} f ( x ) = 1 + x x ​ হয় তবে f ( a b ) + f (   b a ) f\left(\frac{\mathrm{a}}{\mathrm{b}}\right)+f\left(\frac{\mathrm{~b}}{\mathrm{a}}\right) f ( b a ​ ) + f ( a   b ​ ) এর মান কত?
questions.explanation: প্রদত্ত: f ( x ) = x 1 + x f(x) = \frac{x}{1+x} f ( x ) = 1 + x x ​ এখন, f ( a b ) = a b 1 + a b = a b b + a b = a a + b f\left(\frac{a}{b}\right) = \frac{\frac{a}{b}}{1+\frac{a}{b}} = \frac{\frac{a}{b}}{\frac{b+a}{b}} = \frac{a}{a+b} f ( b a ​ ) = 1 + b a ​ b a ​ ​ = b b + a ​ b a ​ ​ = a + b a ​ আবার, f ( b a ) = b a 1 + b a = b a a + b a = b a + b f\left(\frac{b}{a}\right) = \frac{\frac{b}{a}}{1+\frac{b}{a}} = \frac{\frac{b}{a}}{\frac{a+b}{a}} = \frac{b}{a+b} f ( a b ​ ) = 1 + a b ​ a b ​ ​ = a a + b ​ a b ​ ​ = a + b b ​ যোগ করলে: f ( a b ) + f ( b a ) = a a + b + b a + b = a + b a + b = 1 f\left(\frac{a}{b}\right) + f\left(\frac{b}{a}\right) = \frac{a}{a+b} + \frac{b}{a+b} = \frac{a+b}{a+b} = 1 f ( b a ​ ) + f ( a b ​ ) = a + b a ​ + a + b b ​ = a + b a + b ​ = 1

questions.question: 0.0768 এর লগের অংশক কত?
questions.explanation: Step 1: Express in Scientific Form We can write: 0.0768 = 7.68 × 10 − 2 0.0768=7.68 \times 10^{-2} 0.0768 = 7.68 × 1 0 − 2 Using logarithm properties: log ⁡ ( 0.0768 ) = log ⁡ ( 7.68 × 10 − 2 ) = log ⁡ 7.68 + log ⁡ 10 − 2 = log ⁡ 7.68 − 2 \begin{array}{c} \log (0.0768)=\log \left(7.68 \times 10^{-2}\right) \\ =\log 7.68+\log 10^{-2} \\ =\log 7.68-2 \end{array} lo g ( 0.0768 ) = lo g ( 7.68 × 1 0 − 2 ) = lo g 7.68 + lo g 1 0 − 2 = lo g 7.68 − 2 ​ Step 2: Find log ⁡ 7.68 \log 7.68 lo g 7.68 From logarithm tables, log ⁡ 7.68 ≈ 0.8857 \log 7.68 \approx 0.8857 lo g 7.68 ≈ 0.8857 Thus, log ⁡ 0.0768 = 0.8857 − 2 = − 1.1143 \begin{array}{c} \log 0.0768=0.8857-2 \\ =-1.1143 \end{array} lo g 0.0768 = 0.8857 − 2 = − 1.1143 ​ Step 3: Identify the Mantissa In logarithms, the characteristic is the integer part (-1), while the mantissa is the decimal part (0.8857).

questions.question: 2 + p + 6 + q + 10 + r + 2+p+6+q+10+r+ 2 + p + 6 + q + 10 + r + … . …. … . সমান্তর ধারাভুক্ত হলে- i. p \mathrm{p} p এর মান 4 ii. r এর মান 12 iii. প্রথম 6 টি পদের সমষ্টি 42 নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?
questions.explanation: (i) ১ম পদ, a = 2 a=2 a = 2 সাধারণ অন্তর = d =d = d n  তম পদ  = a + ( n − 1 ) d ∴  ৩য় পদ  = a + ( 3 − 1 ) d = 2 + 2 d \begin{array}{l} n \text { তম পদ }=a+(n-1) d \\ \therefore \text { ৩য় পদ }=a+(3-1) d \\ =2+2 d \end{array} n   তম   পদ   = a + ( n − 1 ) d ∴   ৩য়   পদ   = a + ( 3 − 1 ) d = 2 + 2 d ​ ∴ 2 + 2 d = 6 ⇒ 2 d = 4 ⇒ d = 2 \begin{array}{l} \therefore 2+2 d=6 \\ \Rightarrow 2 d=4 \\ \Rightarrow d=2 \end{array} ∴ 2 + 2 d = 6 ⇒ 2 d = 4 ⇒ d = 2 ​ ২য় পদ, P = a + ( 2 − 1 ) d P=a+(2-1) d P = a + ( 2 − 1 ) d = a + d = 2 + 2 = 4 \begin{array}{l} =a+d \\ =2+2=4 \end{array} = a + d = 2 + 2 = 4 ​ (ii) ৬ষ্ঠ পদ, n = a + ( 6 − 1 ) d n=a+(6-1) d n = a + ( 6 − 1 ) d = a + 5 d = 2 + 5 × 2 = 12 \begin{array}{l} =a+5 d \\ =2+5 \times 2=12 \end{array} = a + 5 d = 2 + 5 × 2 = 12 ​ (iii) প্রথম n n n সংখ্যক পদের সমষ্টি, S n = n 2 { 2 a + ( n − 1 ) d } ∴ S 6 = 6 2 { 2 ⋅ 2 + ( 6 − 1 ) ⋅ 2 } = 3 ( 4 + 10 ) = 42 \begin{array}{l} S_{n}=\frac{n}{2}\{2 a+(n-1) d\} \\ \therefore S_{6}=\frac{6}{2}\{2 \cdot 2+(6-1) \cdot 2\} \\ =3(4+10) \\ =42 \end{array} S n ​ = 2 n ​ { 2 a + ( n − 1 ) d } ∴ S 6 ​ = 2 6 ​ { 2 ⋅ 2 + ( 6 − 1 ) ⋅ 2 } = 3 ( 4 + 10 ) = 42 ​
